definition: Beware of suspicious folk bearing gifts, they are sure to be ill-intentioned. (idiom)
pinyin: huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2

definition: see 黃鼠狼給雞拜年|黄鼠狼给鸡拜年[huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2]
pinyin: huang2 shu3 lang2 gei3 ji1 bai4 nian2 , mei2 an1 hao3 xin1
containing_words.word: 黃鼠狼給雞拜年，沒安好心

sentences.english: The Weasels and the Mice were always up in arms against each other.
sentences.chinese: 黃鼠狼與老鼠一族一直以來都爭鬥不休。

sentences.english: Herbie had bared his weasel teeth.
sentences.chinese: 赫比露出了黃鼠狼般的牙齒。

sentences.english: The weasels killed all but four of the 100 chipmunks in this population.
sentences.chinese: 這羣的100個金花鼠被黃鼠狼獵食得只剩下4只。

sentences.english: Chandler's weasel face screwed into an obsequious smile.
sentences.chinese: 錢德勒黃鼠狼似的臉上現出了諂媚的笑容。

sentences.english: It is made of goat's or weasel's hair.
sentences.chinese: 它由山羊毛或黃鼠狼毛製成。

sentences.english: A weasel ran off with a chick in its mouth.
When the four Weasels felt that they were free from harm they walked toward the chicken coop.
sentences.chinese: 這四隻黃鼠狼覺得後顧無憂，就朝着雞圈走去。

sentences.english: The Weasel refused, saying that he was by nature the enemy of all birds.
sentences.chinese: 黃鼠狼說絕不會放過他，自己生來悵恨鳥類。

sentences.english: You make pineapples look like skunks .
sentences.chinese: 你把菠蘿畫得像黃鼠狼。

sentences.english: BAT who fell upon the ground and was caught by a Weasel pleaded to be spared his life.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠掉落在地上，被黃鼠狼叼去，他懇討饒命。

sentences.english: A bat who fell upon the ground and was caught by a Weasel pleaded to be spared his life.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠掉落在地上，被黃鼠狼叼去，他請求饒命。

sentences.english: The weasel population also increased, following the growth of the chipmunk population.
sentences.chinese: 黃鼠狼羣也隨着金花鼠數目的增加增長了。

sentences.english: The proper relations between the hunted pole-cat and the hunting dog were observed.
sentences.chinese: 在被追捕的黃鼠狼和獵狗之間所要求的距離被保持着。

sentences.english: You are just a chicken-stealing weasel.
sentences.chinese: 你頂多就是披着人皮的黃鼠狼。

sentences.english: Eagles may soar, but weasels don't get sucked into jet engines.
sentences.chinese: 雄鷹可以翱翔，但黃鼠狼不會被吸到噴氣機引擎裏。

sentences.english: If Stela had been an animal, he would have been a weasel.
sentences.chinese: 拿動物來比，斯特拉酷似一隻黃鼠狼。

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
(bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
vivid and colorful (idiom); true to life/lively and realistic
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
